page.title: 18LIFE STYLES - School Cook
page.content: We intervied our school cook Mrs. Wheeldon about how she spent her day. 'The 'teasmade' wakes me up at 6a.m. with a cup of tea, get up about 6.20 get dressed and make the bed. I have a leisurely cooked breakfast - cornflakes,bacon,egg, fried bread,I listen to news on Raido Derby, I lay the fire for when I get home from work, I dust and vacuum the living room& feed the cat, I then get ready for work at 8a.m. When I arrive at school I change to white overall & cap. First job in the kitchen is to fill the sterilizer. Then I begin to start preparing the meat,vegetables etc., Mrs. Dunsby arrives later in the morning to help me. We serve dinners at 12o'clock. I finish at 2.30 On the way home I call at a friends,when I arrive home I light the fire. I cook my husbands tea.
